title: Ep 301 | Phil Robertson Was a US Park Ranger and Jase Saw Al Get Struck by Lightning
description:
Phil reveals that he was once a United States park ranger. Al talks about the time he was struck by lightning. Family friend Gary Osborne drops in to discuss Romans 9. Jase describes what it was like to be in a rollover crash while sitting in the back. Phil thinks of Jesus as the perfect attorney. And Jase discusses people who hate anyone who believes in Jesus.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
